Lack enough support: The claim that there is only one person in charge of painting the entire Milwaukee County parks system is not supported by any evidence or data.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the information from a study conducted by a national consulting firm in October 2010, which found that changes made by the county have been effective in reducing backups.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that having only one person in charge of painting the parks system is a negative or problematic situation, without providing any explanation or evidence for why this would be the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider or provide any alternative explanations for the current situation of having one person in charge of painting the parks system.
